content: Automatic file indexing disabled in the room

comment.text: This translation key is used for the UI message that indicates automatic file indexing is disabled in a room. It appears when the user interacts with settings or options related to file management or room features.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تفعيل الفهرسة التلقائية للملفات معطل في الغرفة' literally translates to 'Automatic file indexing activation is disabled in the room'. It's a bit awkward and not the most natural way to express the intended meaning. A more accurate and natural phrasing would be 'الفهرسة التلقائية للملفات معطلة في الغرفة'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: الفهرسة التلقائية للملفات معطلة في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vypnutí automatického indexování souborů v místnosti' literally translates to 'Turning off automatic file indexing in the room'. While understandable, 'disabled' implies a state of being, not an action of turning off. A more accurate translation would reflect that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Automatické indexování souborů v místnosti je zakázáno

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Έγινε απενεργοποίηση της αυτόματης ευρετηρίασης αρχείων στο δωμάτιο' is a bit verbose and formal for a user interface message. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Απενεργοποίηση αυτόματης ευρετηρίασης αρχείων στο δωμάτιο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice ('Έγινε απενεργοποίηση...') which can feel less direct in UI messages.  A more active voice is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Απενεργοποίηση αυτόματης ευρετηρίασης αρχείων στο δωμάτιο

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Lao. "ການນໍາໃຊ້ການຄົ້ນຫາເອກະສານແບບອັດຕະໂນມັດຖືກປິດການນໍາໃຊ້" is a very wordy way to convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ອັດຕະໂນມັດການຄົ້ນຫາເອກະສານປິດການນໍາໃຊ້ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrasing 'ຖືກປິດການນໍາໃຊ້' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປິດການນໍາໃຊ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Automatic file indexing' is better translated as 'Automatische bestandsindexering' rather than 'Automatische indexeren van bestanden'. The latter is less concise and sounds slightly unnatural in Dutch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Automatische bestandsindexering uitgeschakeld in de kamer

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "කාමරයේ ස්වයංක්‍රීය ගොනු දර්ශනය අක්‍රිය කර ඇත" doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of "Automatic file indexing disabled in the room." "දර්ශනය" (darshana) means 'view' or 'display', not 'indexing'. A more accurate translation would focus on the indexing process itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයේ ස්වයංක්‍රීය ගොනු ක්‍රියාවලිය අක්‍රිය කර ඇත (Kamaraye swayanakriya gonu kriyawaliya akriya kara ath) - This translates to 'Automatic file indexing process disabled in the room'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tự động lập chỉ mục tập tin đã bị vô hiệu hóa trong phòng' is a bit literal and doesn't flow naturally in Vietnamese. 'Lập chỉ mục' is a direct translation of 'indexing' but might be too technical for the intended user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tự động lập chỉ mục tệp tin đã tắt trong phòng

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'vô hiệu hóa' is a bit formal. A more common and understandable term would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tự động lập chỉ mục tệp tin đã bị tắt trong phòng

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Although 'tệp tin' is correct, 'tài liệu' might be a more user-friendly term, depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tự động lập chỉ mục tài liệu đã bị tắt trong phòng
